div.p:
Online user 1:
So environment isn't as important as our biology? I gotta admitâ€¦ I didn't expect that.

Online user 2:
Yeah I always thought people learned this stuff from their parents, like, "Hey, I learned it from you, Dad."

Online user 3:
So I guess I've got nothing to worry about. My parents haven't had a drink since their wedding.

Online user 4:
So, it doesn't mean you're safe. There's no get-out-of-jail-free card or anything. I mean, just because my dad was an alcoholic, it's no guarantee that I'm going to become one.
